set.name: SD05
set.longname: Starter Deck - Waltz of the Undying Night

set.name: BP01SL
set.longname: Booster Set #1 -"Advent of Genesis" - Super Legendary

card.name: [SE] Evolution Point
card.text: At the start of the game, the player who goes second has 3 Evolution Points. You can use an Evoluton Point toward paying an [Evolve] cost by flipping this card over so that the card back is showing. An Evolution Point is equal to 1 play point. (Only 1 Evolution Point can be used per evolution.)

card.name: [SE] Queen Vampire
card.text: [Fanfare] Summon 2 Forest Bat tokens. [Act] [Engage], give your leader [Defense]-1: Summon 2 Forest Bat tokens. Whenever a Forest Bat token is put onto your field, give it[Attack]+1 and Ward.

card.name: [SE] Alucard
card.text: Storm. [Fanfare] Necrocharge (10): Give this follower[Attack]+2. Strike: Select an enemy follower on the field. Deal it 4 damage and give your leader [Defense]+4.

card.name: [SE] Playful Necromancer
card.text: [Evolve] [1]: Evolve this follower.

card.name: [SE] Playful Necromancer (Evolved)
card.text: On Evolve: Summon 3 Ghost tokens.

card.name: [SE] Midnight Vampire
card.text: [Fanfare] Summon a Forest Bat token. While this card is on your field, your Forest Bat tokens have Drain. (When a follower with Drain attacks and deals damage, its leader gains defense equal to the damage dealt.)

card.name: [SE] Night Horde
card.text: Summon 2 Forest Bat tokens. Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it X damage. X equals the number of Forest Bat tokens on your field.

card.name: [SE] Spectre
card.text: Bane. (Followers attacking or attacked by a follower with Bane are destroyed after damage is exchanged.) [Fanfare] Give your leader [Defense]-2: Give this follower Rush. Put the top card of your deck into your cemetery.

card.name: [SE] Spartoi Sergeant
card.text: [Fanfare] Put the top 2 cards of your deck into your cemetery.

card.name: [SE] Undead King
card.text: [Fanfare] Select up to 2 followers in your cemetery and add them to your hand.

card.name: [SE] Lesser Mummy
card.text: [Evolve] [1]: Evolve this follower. [Fanfare] Necrocharge (10): Give this follower Storm. (If your cemetery contains at least 10 cards, perform Necrocharge (10).)

card.name: [SE] Lesser Mummy (Evolved)
card.text: Strike: Summon a Ghost token.

card.name: [SE] Lilith
card.text: [Evolve] [1]: Evolve this follower. [Fanfare] Put a Forest Bat token into your EX area.

card.name: [SE] Lilith (Evolved)
card.text: Strike: Give your leader [Defense]+2.

card.name: [SE] Razory Claw
card.text: [Quick] Deal 2 damage to your leader. Select an enemy leader or enemy follower on the field and deal it 3 damage.

card.name: [SE] Undying Resentment
card.text: [Quick] Select an enemy follower on the field. Deal it 3 damage and put the top card of your deck into your cemetery.

card.name: [SE] Summon Bloodkin
card.text: Summon a Forest Bat token. Put a Forest Bat token into your EX area.

card.name: [SE] Ghost
card.text: Storm. (Followers with Storm can attack enemy followers and leaders on the turn they're put onto your field.) At the start of your end phase, banish this card.

card.name: [SE] Cerberus
card.text: [Evolve] [2]: Evolve this follower. [Fanfare] Put a Mimi or Coco token into your EX area. Necrocharge (10): Put both into your EX area instead.

card.name: [SE] Cerberus (Evolved)
card.text: On Evolve: Put a Mimi and Coco token into your EX area.

card.name: [SE] Lord Atomy
card.text: When playing this card, put 4 reserved [Abysscraft] cards from your field into your cemetery, or banish 4 [Abysscraft] cards in your EX area: This card costs 9 less to play.

card.name: [SE] Medusa
card.text: If Sanguine is active for you, this card costs 1 less to play. Necrocharge (10): This card costs 1 less to play. Bane. [Act] [Engage]: Select an enemy follower on the field and destroy it.

card.name: [SE] Righteous Devil
card.text: [Evolve] Give your leader [Defense]-3: Evolve this follower. Bane.

card.name: [SE] Righteous Devil (Evolved)
card.text: Assail. Bane. Whenever an enemy follower is destroyed, deal 1 damage to its leader and give your leader [Defense]+1.

card.name: [SE] Mordecai the Duelist
card.text: [Lastwords] Give your leader [Defense]-3: Put this follower onto your field.

card.name: [SE] Dire Bond
card.text: [Fanfare] Deal 1 damage to your leader. Draw a card. [Act] [2], [Engage], put this card into your cemetery: Deal 1 damage to your leader.Â Draw a card.

card.name: [SE] Hell's Unleasher
card.text: [Act] [Engage], put this card into your cemetery: Select a follower that costs at least 3 play points in your cemetery and add it to your hand.

card.name: [SE] Crazed Executioner
card.text: [Evolve] [1]: Evolve this follower.

card.name: [SE] Crazed Executioner (Evolved)
card.text: On Evolve: Deal 2 damage to your leader. Select an opponent. They reveal their hand. Select a card in their hand. The opponent discards that card.

card.name: [SE] Dark Summoner
card.text: [Fanfare] If Sanguine is active for you, give this follower[Attack]+1/[Defense]+1 and Rush.

card.name: [SE] Dark General
card.text: [Fanfare] If Sanguine is active for you, give this follower Storm.

card.name: [SE] Phantom Howl
card.text: Summon 4 Ghost tokens.

card.name: [SE] Death's Breath
card.text: Select a follower that costs 8 play points or less in your cemetery. Put it onto your field and give it Ward.

card.name: [SE] Soul Conversion
card.text: [Quick] Select a follower on your field. Destroy it and draw 2 cards.

card.name: [SE] Skeleton Fighter
card.text: [Fanfare] If Sanguine is active for you, give this follower[Attack]+1/[Defense]+1.

card.name: [SE] Ambling Wraith
card.text: [Fanfare] Deal 1 damage to each leader.

card.name: [SE] Rabbit Necromancer
card.text: [Lastwords] Deal 2 damage to each leader.

card.name: [SE] Wardrobe Raider
card.text: [Evolve] [0]: Evolve this follower.

card.name: [SE] Wardrobe Raider (Evolved)
card.text: On Evolve, put a follower from your field into your cemetery: Select an enemy follower on the field and destroy it.

card.name: [SE] Mimi
card.text: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 2 damage.

card.name: [SE] Coco
card.text: Select a follower on your field and give it[Attack]+2.

card.name: [SE] Fafnir
card.text: [Fanfare] Deal 5 damage to each enemy follower on the field.

card.name: [SE] Dragon Oracle
card.text: Choose one of the following effects. (1)Â Increase your maximum play points by 1. (2)Â Draw a card.

card.name: [SE] Dragon Warrior
card.text: [Evolve] [1]: Evolve this follower.

card.name: [SE] Dragon Warrior (Evolved)
card.text: On Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 3 damage.

card.name: [SE] Dragonewt Princess
card.text: [Fanfare] If Overflow is active for you, select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 4 damage. (Overflow becomes active if your maximum number of play points is at least 7.)

card.name: [SE] Dragonguard
card.text: Ward. (This follower can be engaged when it's put onto your field or during your end phase. When followers with Ward are engaged, your opponent can only attack them.) [Fanfare] If Overflow is active for you, give this follower[Attack]+2/[Defense]+2.

card.name: [SE] Fire Lizard
card.text: [Fanfare] Select an enemy leader or enemy follower on the field and deal it 1 damage.

card.name: [SE] Dread Dragon
card.text: [Fanfare] Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 7 damage.

card.name: [SE] Roc
card.text: [Evolve] [0]: Evolve this follower. Strike: Give this follower[Attack]+1.

card.name: [SE] Roc (Evolved)
card.text: Strike: Give this follower[Attack]+1/[Defense]+1.

card.name: [SE] Glint Dragon
card.text: [Fanfare] Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 3 damage.

card.name: [SE] Dragonrider
card.text: [Evolve] [1]: Evolve this follower. [Fanfare] If Overflow is active for you, put a Dragon token into your EX area.

card.name: [SE] Dragonrider (Evolved)
card.text: On Evolve: If Overflow is active for you, give this follower[Attack]+2. (Overflow becomes active if your maximum number of play points is at least 7.)

card.name: [SE] Seabrand Dragon
card.text: [Fanfare] If Overflow is active for you, give this follower Storm. (Followers with Storm can attack enemy followers and leaders on the turn they're put onto your field.)

card.name: [SE] Blazing Breath
card.text: [Quick] Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 2 damage. If Overflow is active for you, deal 4 damage instead. (Overflow becomes active if your maximum number of play points is at least 7.)

card.name: [SE] Dragon Wings
card.text: Deal 2 damage to each follower on the field. If Overflow is active for you, deal 3 damage instead. (Overflow becomes active if your maximum number of play points is at least 7.)

card.name: [SE] Dark Dragoon Forte
card.text: [Evolve] [2]: Evolve this follower. Storm.

card.name: [SE] Dark Dragoon Forte (Evolved)
card.text: Storm. Aura.

card.name: [SE] Zirnitra
card.text: [Fanfare] Put a Dragon token into your EX area. [Act] [2], [Engage]: Select a Dragon token in your EX area. Put it onto your field and give it Rush.Â If Overflow is active for you, recover 2 play points.

card.name: [SE] Aiela, Dragon Knight
card.text: Assail. [Lastwords] Increase your maximum play points by 1.

card.name: [SE] Genesis Dragon
card.text: Storm.

card.name: [SE] Shapeshifting Mage
card.text: [Evolve] [1]: Evolve this follower. [Fanfare] If Overflow is active for you, give this follower[Attack]+3/[Defense]+3.

card.name: [SE] Shapeshifting Mage (Evolved)
card.text: Assail. Bane.

card.name: [SE] Phoenix Roost
card.text: At the start of each player's main phase, that player looks at the top card of their deck. If it's a follower, they may put it onto their field.

card.name: [SE] Wyvern Cavalier
card.text: [Fanfare] Put the top card of your deck into your EX area. It costs 2 less to play.

card.name: [SE] Dragonewt Scholar
card.text: Intimidate. Strike: Draw a card, then discard a card.

card.name: [SE] Shenlong
card.text: [Evolve] [2]: Evolve this follower. Ward. [Fanfare] Draw 2 cards, then discard a card.

card.name: [SE] Shenlong (Evolved)
card.text: Ward. On Evolve: Give your leader [Defense]+5.

card.name: [SE] Imprisoned Dragon
card.text: Ward. This follower can't attack enemies.

card.name: [SE] Conflagration
card.text: Deal 5 damage to each follower on the field.

card.name: [SE] Serpent Wrath
card.text: [Quick] Select an enemy follower on the field. Deal it 5 damage and, if Overflow is active for you, draw a card.

card.name: [SE] Wyrm Spire
card.text: While this card is on your field, your Dragon tokens have Rush. [Act] [Engage]: Select a follower on the field and destroy it. Its controller summons a Dragon token.

card.name: [SE] Ivory Dragon
card.text: [Evolve] [0]: Evolve this follower.

card.name: [SE] Ivory Dragon (Evolved)
card.text: On Evolve: If Overflow is active for you, draw a card.

card.name: [SE] Ace Dragoon
card.text: Rush. [Fanfare] Select another follower on the field and give this follower[Attack]+X. X equals the selected follower's attack.

card.name: [SE] Mist Dragon
card.text: Intimidate.

card.name: [SE] Dragon Emissary
card.text: Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. You may reveal a [Dragoncraft] card that costs at least 5 play points from among them and add it to your hand. Put the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.name: [SE] Aria, Fairy Princess
card.text: Ward. [Fanfare] Put up to 9 Fairy tokens onto your field or into your EX area. While this card is on your field, your other Pixie followers have Rush.

card.name: [SE] Titania's Sanctuary
card.text: [Fanfare] Give each Pixie token on your field[Attack]+1/[Defense]+1. While this card is on your field, your Pixie tokens have Assail. Whenever a Pixie token is put onto your field, give it[Attack]+1/[Defense]+1.

card.name: [SE] Rose Gardener
card.text: [Evolve] [1]: Evolve this follower.

card.name: [SE] Rose Gardener (Evolved)
card.text: On Evolve: Select an enemy follower on the field and return it to its owner's hand. Combo (3): Draw a card. (Tokens returned to a player's hand are removed from the game.)

card.name: [SE] Waltzing Fairy
card.text: [Fanfare][Lastwords] Put a Fairy token into your EX area.

card.name: [SE] Fairy Caster
card.text: [Fanfare] Summon 3 Fairy tokens. If your field becomes full from this effect, put any remaining tokens into your EX area.

card.name: [SE] Elf Metallurgist
card.text: [Fanfare] Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 1 damage. Combo (3): Deal 3 damage instead. (If you've played at least 3 cards this turn, including this one, perform Combo (3).)

card.name: [SE] Okami
card.text: Whenever another follower is put onto your field, give this follower[Attack]+1/[Defense]+1.

card.name: [SE] Treant
card.text: [Evolve] [2]: Evolve this follower. [Fanfare] Combo (3): Change this card's [Evolve] cost to 0. (If you've played at least 3 cards this turn, including this one, perform Combo (3).)

card.name: [SE] Water Fairy
card.text: [Evolve] [2]: Evolve this follower. [Lastwords] Put a Fairy token into your EX area.

card.name: [SE] Water Fairy (Evolved)
card.text: On Evolve: Summon a Fairy token. [Lastwords] Put a Fairy token into your EX area.

card.name: [SE] Elf Wanderer
card.text: Assail. (Followers with Assail can attack reserved followers.) This follower ignores Ward.

card.name: [SE] Fairy Circle
card.text: Put 3 Fairy tokens into your EX area.

card.name: [SE] Woodland Refuge
card.text: [Fanfare] Select a Pixie follower on your field and give it[Attack]+1. [Act] [1], [Engage]: Return this card to its owner's hand.

card.name: [SE] Sylvan Justice
card.text: [Quick] Select an enemy follower on the field. Deal it 3 damage and put a Fairy token into your EX area.

card.name: [SE] Rose Queen
card.text: [Fanfare] Select any number of Pixie followers in your EX area and transform them into Thorn Burst tokens. [Act] [Engage]: Recover X play points. X equals the number of Thorn Burst tokens in your EX area.

card.name: [SE] Ancient Elf
card.text: [Evolve] [1]: Evolve this follower. Ward. [Fanfare] Return another card on your field to its owner's hand: Give this follower[Attack]+1/[Defense]+1.

card.name: [SE] Ancient Elf (Evolved)
card.text: Ward. On Evolve, return another card on your field to its owner's hand: Give this follower[Attack]+1/[Defense]+1.

card.name: [SE] Rhinoceroach
card.text: [Evolve] [0]: Evolve this follower. Rush. [Fanfare] Give this follower[Attack]+X. X equals the number of cards you've played this turn, excluding this card.

card.name: [SE] Rhinoceroach (Evolved)
card.text: On Evolve: Choose one of the following effects. (1)Â Give this follower Storm. (2)Â Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it X damage. X equals this follower's attack.

card.name: [SE] Robin Hood
card.text: [Fanfare] Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 4 damage. [Act] [1], [Engage]: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 4 damage.

card.name: [SE] Silver Bolt
card.text: [Quick] Select an enemy leader or enemy follower on the field. Draw a card and then deal X damage to the selected enemy. X equals the number of cards in your hand.

card.name: [SE] Homecoming
card.text: Select an enemy follower on the field. Its controller puts it on the top or bottom of its owner's deck. Combo (5): Each opponent puts each follower from their field on the top or bottom of its owner's deck instead. (The controllers determine the placement. Tokens put into a player's deck are removed from the game.)

card.name: [SE] Elven Princess Mage
card.text: [Evolve] [1]: Evolve this follower.

card.name: [SE] Elven Princess Mage (Evolved)
card.text: On Evolve: Put 2 Fairy Wisp tokens into your EX area.

card.name: [SE] Blessed Fairy Dancer
card.text: [Fanfare] Give[Attack]+1/[Defense]+1 to each other Pixie follower on your field and in your EX area.

card.name: [SE] Elf Child May
card.text: [Fanfare] Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 1 damage. When this card is returned to hand from your field, select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 1 damage.

card.name: [SE] Fairy Beast
card.text: [Act] Banish a Pixie follower in your EX area: Give your leader [Defense]+3 and draw a card. This ability can be activated once per turn.

card.name: [SE] Noble Fairy
card.text: Ward. [Fanfare] Combo (3): Select an enemy follower on the field. Destroy it and summon a Fairy token on that follower's field.

card.name: [SE] Nature's Guidance
card.text: Select a card on your field. Return it to its owner's hand and draw a card.

card.name: [SE] Harvest Festival
card.text: [Act] [1], [Engage], put this card into your cemetery: Give your leader [Defense]+1. When this card leaves your field, draw a card.

card.name: [SE] Archer
card.text: [Evolve] [1]: Evolve this follower. Whenever another follower is put onto your field, select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 1 damage.

card.name: [SE] Archer (Evolved)
card.text: Whenever another follower is put onto your field, select up to 2 enemy followers on the field and deal them 1 damage.

card.name: [SE] Fairy Whisperer
card.text: [Fanfare] Summon a Fairy token. Put a Fairy token into your EX area.

card.name: [SE] Mana Elk
card.text: Whenever one of your Pixie followers attacks, select an enemy leader or enemy follower on the field and deal it 1 damage.

card.text: [Quick] Select an enemy follower on the field. It cannot deal damage this turn.

card.name: [SE] Thorn Burst
card.text: Select an enemy leader or enemy follower on the field. Deal it 3 damage and draw a card.

card.text: [Act] [Engage], put this card into your cemetery: Select an enemy follower on the field and engage it. [Act] [10], [Engage], put this card into your cemetery: Banish each follower on the field.

card.name: [SE] Sorcery Cache
card.text: [Quick] Look at the top 4 cards of your deck. You may reveal a spell from among them and add it to your hand. You may also put a spell into your cemetery. Put the remaining cards on the bottom of your deck in any order.

card.text: [Quick] Select an enemy follower on the field and destroy it. Spellchain (10): Deal 3 damage to that follower's leader. (If you have at least 10 spells in your cemetery, excluding this card, perform Spellchain (10).)

card.name: [SE] Strikeform Golem
card.text: Rush. (Followers with Rush can attack enemy followers on the turn they're put onto your field.)

card.name: [SE] Guardform Golem
card.text: Ward. (This follower can be engaged when it's put onto your field or during your end phase. When followers with Ward are engaged, your opponent can only attack them.)

card.name: [SE] Arch Summoner Erasmus
card.text: [Fanfare] Earth Rite: Select an enemy follower on the field. Deal 6 damage to it and 2 damage to its leader. [Act] [Engage], Earth Rite: Select an enemy follower on the field. Deal 6 damage to it and 2 damage to its leader.

card.name: [SE] Merlin
card.text: [Evolve] [2]: Evolve this follower. [Fanfare] Search your deck for a spell, reveal it, and add it to your hand.

card.name: [SE] Merlin (Evolved)
card.text: On Evolve: Select a spell that costs 3 play points or less in your cemetery and play it for 0 play points.

card.name: [SE] Ancient Alchemist
card.text: [Evolve] [3]: Evolve this follower. [Fanfare] Earth Rite: Put 2 Guardform Golem tokens into your EX area.

card.name: [SE] Ancient Alchemist (Evolved)
card.text: While this card is on your field, your Golem followers cost 1 less to play. Whenever a Golem follower is put onto your field, select an enemy leader or enemy follower on the field and deal it 3 damage.

card.name: [SE] Arcane Enlightenment
card.text: [Quick] Put the top card of your deck into your EX area. Repeat until your EX area is full. At the start of your next end phase, banish each card in your EX area.

card.name: [SE] Dimension Shift
card.text: When playing this card, banish 10 spells in your cemetery: This card costs 7 play points to play. Take another turn after this one.

card.name: [SE] Juno's Secret Laboratory
card.text: [Fanfare] Summon a Guardform Golem or Strikeform Golem token. [Act] [Engage]: Summon a Magic Sediment token. [Act] [Engage], Earth Rite: Summon a Guardform Golem or Strikeform Golem token.

card.name: [SE] Spectral Wizard
card.text: [Evolve] [2]: Evolve this follower. [Fanfare] Look at the top card of your deck. If it's a spell, you may reveal it and add it to your hand.

card.name: [SE] Spectral Wizard (Evolved)
card.text: On Evolve, discard a spell: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 4 damage.

card.name: [SE] Flame Destroyer
card.text: Spellchain (5): This card costs 3 less to play. SC (10): It costs 6 less instead. SC (15): It costs 9 less instead. Rush.

card.name: [SE] Dragonbond Mage
card.text: Whenever you play a spell, place 1 spell counter on this card. [Act] Remove 3 spell counters from this card: Select an enemy follower on the field and deal it 5 damage.

card.name: [SE] Golem Protection
card.text: Summon 2 Guardform Golem tokens. Earth Rite: Give each Golem follower on your field[Attack]+1/[Defense]+1.

card.name: [SE] Alchemical Lore
card.text: Deal 4 damage to each enemy follower on the field.

card.name: [SE] Fate's Hand
card.text: [Quick] Draw 2 cards. Spellchain (10): Recover 1 play point.

card.name: [SE] Price of Magic
card.text: Stack. [Fanfare] Select an enemy follower with 4 defense or less on the field and banish it.

card.name: [SE] Teachings of Creation

card.name: [SE] Magic Sediment
card.text: Stack. (Amulets with Stack are put onto the field with 1 Stack counter and have the following abilities. When this card would leave the field, remove 1 Stack counter from it instead. When this card's Stack count reaches 0, destroy it. [Act] [Engage]: Select another amulet with Stack on your field and transfer all this card's Stack counters to that card.
